00046 #pragma once
00047 #ifndef AI_MATRIX3X3_INL_INC
00048 #define AI_MATRIX3X3_INL_INC

00050 #ifdef __cplusplus
00051 #include "matrix3x3.h"

00058 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00059 // Construction from a 4x4 matrix. The remaining parts of the matrix are ignored.
00060 template <typename TReal>
00061 inline aiMatrix3x3t<TReal>::aiMatrix3x3t( const aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>& pMatrix)
00062 {
00063     a1 = pMatrix.a1; a2 = pMatrix.a2; a3 = pMatrix.a3;
00064     b1 = pMatrix.b1; b2 = pMatrix.b2; b3 = pMatrix.b3;
00065     c1 = pMatrix.c1; c2 = pMatrix.c2; c3 = pMatrix.c3;
00066 }
00067 
00068 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00069 template <typename TReal>
00070 inline aiMatrix3x3t<TReal>& aiMatrix3x3t<TReal>::operator *= (const aiMatrix3x3t<TReal>& m)
00071 {
00072     *this = aiMatrix3x3t<TReal>(m.a1 * a1 + m.b1 * a2 + m.c1 * a3,
00073         m.a2 * a1 + m.b2 * a2 + m.c2 * a3,
00074         m.a3 * a1 + m.b3 * a2 + m.c3 * a3,
00075         m.a1 * b1 + m.b1 * b2 + m.c1 * b3,
00076         m.a2 * b1 + m.b2 * b2 + m.c2 * b3,
00077         m.a3 * b1 + m.b3 * b2 + m.c3 * b3,
00078         m.a1 * c1 + m.b1 * c2 + m.c1 * c3,
00079         m.a2 * c1 + m.b2 * c2 + m.c2 * c3,
00080         m.a3 * c1 + m.b3 * c2 + m.c3 * c3);
00081     return *this;
00082 }
00083 
00084 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00085 template <typename TReal>
00086 template <typename TOther>
00087 aiMatrix3x3t<TReal>::operator aiMatrix3x3t<TOther> () const
00088 {
00089     return aiMatrix3x3t<TOther>(static_cast<TOther>(a1),static_cast<TOther>(a2),static_cast<TOther>(a3),
00090         static_cast<TOther>(b1),static_cast<TOther>(b2),static_cast<TOther>(b3),
00091         static_cast<TOther>(c1),static_cast<TOther>(c2),static_cast<TOther>(c3));
00092 }
00093 
00094 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00095 template <typename TReal>
00096 inline aiMatrix3x3t<TReal> aiMatrix3x3t<TReal>::operator* (const aiMatrix3x3t<TReal>& m) const
00097 {
00098     aiMatrix3x3t<TReal> temp( *this);
00099     temp *= m;
00100     return temp;
00101 }

00103 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00104 template <typename TReal>
00105 inline TReal* aiMatrix3x3t<TReal>::operator[] (unsigned int p_iIndex) {
00106     switch ( p_iIndex ) {
00107         case 0:
00108             return &a1;
00109         case 1:
00110             return &b1;
00111         case 2:
00112             return &c1;
00113         default:
00114             break;
00115     }
00116     return &a1;
00117 }
00118

00120 template <typename TReal>
00121 inline const TReal* aiMatrix3x3t<TReal>::operator[] (unsigned int p_iIndex) const {
00122     switch ( p_iIndex ) {
00123         case 0:
00124             return &a1;
00125         case 1:
00126             return &b1;
00127         case 2:
00128             return &c1;
00129         default:
00130             break;
00131     }
00132     return &a1;
00133 }

00135 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00136 template <typename TReal>
00137 inline bool aiMatrix3x3t<TReal>::operator== (const aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>& m) const
00138 {
00139     return a1 == m.a1 && a2 == m.a2 && a3 == m.a3 &&
00140            b1 == m.b1 && b2 == m.b2 && b3 == m.b3 &&
00141            c1 == m.c1 && c2 == m.c2 && c3 == m.c3;
00142 }
00143 
00144 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00145 template <typename TReal>
00146 inline bool aiMatrix3x3t<TReal>::operator!= (const aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>& m) const
00147 {
00148     return !(*this == m);
00149 }

00151 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00152 template<typename TReal>
00153 inline bool aiMatrix3x3t<TReal>::Equal(const aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>& m, TReal epsilon) const {
00154     return
00155         std::abs(a1 - m.a1) <= epsilon &&
00156         std::abs(a2 - m.a2) <= epsilon &&
00157         std::abs(a3 - m.a3) <= epsilon &&
00158         std::abs(b1 - m.b1) <= epsilon &&
00159         std::abs(b2 - m.b2) <= epsilon &&
00160         std::abs(b3 - m.b3) <= epsilon &&
00161         std::abs(c1 - m.c1) <= epsilon &&
00162         std::abs(c2 - m.c2) <= epsilon &&
00163         std::abs(c3 - m.c3) <= epsilon;
00164 }

00166 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00167 template <typename TReal>
00168 inline aiMatrix3x3t<TReal>& aiMatrix3x3t<TReal>::Transpose()
00169 {
00170     // (TReal&) don't remove, GCC complains cause of packed fields
00171     std::swap( (TReal&)a2, (TReal&)b1);
00172     std::swap( (TReal&)a3, (TReal&)c1);
00173     std::swap( (TReal&)b3, (TReal&)c2);
00174     return *this;
00175 }
00176 
00177 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00178 template <typename TReal>
00179 inline TReal aiMatrix3x3t<TReal>::Determinant() const
00180 {
00181     return a1*b2*c3 - a1*b3*c2 + a2*b3*c1 - a2*b1*c3 + a3*b1*c2 - a3*b2*c1;
00182 }
00183 
00184 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00185 template <typename TReal>
00186 inline aiMatrix3x3t<TReal>& aiMatrix3x3t<TReal>::Inverse()
00187 {
00188     // Compute the reciprocal determinant
00189     TReal det = Determinant();
00190     if(det == static_cast<TReal>(0.0))
00191     {
00192         // Matrix not invertible. Setting all elements to nan is not really
00193         // correct in a mathematical sense; but at least qnans are easy to
00194         // spot. XXX we might throw an exception instead, which would
00195         // be even much better to spot :/.
00196         const TReal nan = std::numeric_limits<TReal>::quiet_NaN();
00197         *this = aiMatrix3x3t<TReal>( nan,nan,nan,nan,nan,nan,nan,nan,nan);
00198 
00199         return *this;
00200     }
00201 
00202     TReal invdet = static_cast<TReal>(1.0) / det;
00203 
00204     aiMatrix3x3t<TReal> res;
00205     res.a1 = invdet  * (b2 * c3 - b3 * c2);
00206     res.a2 = -invdet * (a2 * c3 - a3 * c2);
00207     res.a3 = invdet  * (a2 * b3 - a3 * b2);
00208     res.b1 = -invdet * (b1 * c3 - b3 * c1);
00209     res.b2 = invdet  * (a1 * c3 - a3 * c1);
00210     res.b3 = -invdet * (a1 * b3 - a3 * b1);
00211     res.c1 = invdet  * (b1 * c2 - b2 * c1);
00212     res.c2 = -invdet * (a1 * c2 - a2 * c1);
00213     res.c3 = invdet  * (a1 * b2 - a2 * b1);
00214     *this = res;
00215 
00216     return *this;
00217 }
00218 
00219 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00220 template <typename TReal>
00221 inline aiMatrix3x3t<TReal>& aiMatrix3x3t<TReal>::RotationZ(TReal a, aiMatrix3x3t<TReal>& out)
00222 {
00223     out.a1 = out.b2 = std::cos(a);
00224     out.b1 = std::sin(a);
00225     out.a2 = - out.b1;
00226 
00227     out.a3 = out.b3 = out.c1 = out.c2 = 0.f;
00228     out.c3 = 1.f;
00229 
00230     return out;
00231 }
00232 
00233 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00234 // Returns a rotation matrix for a rotation around an arbitrary axis.
00235 template <typename TReal>
00236 inline aiMatrix3x3t<TReal>& aiMatrix3x3t<TReal>::Rotation( TReal a, const aiVector3t<TReal>& axis, aiMatrix3x3t<TReal>& out)
00237 {
00238   TReal c = std::cos( a), s = std::sin( a), t = 1 - c;
00239   TReal x = axis.x, y = axis.y, z = axis.z;
00240 
00241   // Many thanks to MathWorld and Wikipedia
00242   out.a1 = t*x*x + c;   out.a2 = t*x*y - s*z; out.a3 = t*x*z + s*y;
00243   out.b1 = t*x*y + s*z; out.b2 = t*y*y + c;   out.b3 = t*y*z - s*x;
00244   out.c1 = t*x*z - s*y; out.c2 = t*y*z + s*x; out.c3 = t*z*z + c;
00245 
00246   return out;
00247 }
00248 
00249 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00250 template <typename TReal>
00251 inline aiMatrix3x3t<TReal>& aiMatrix3x3t<TReal>::Translation( const aiVector2t<TReal>& v, aiMatrix3x3t<TReal>& out)
00252 {
00253     out = aiMatrix3x3t<TReal>();
00254     out.a3 = v.x;
00255     out.b3 = v.y;
00256     return out;
00257 }
00258 
00259 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00268 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00269 template <typename TReal>
00270 inline aiMatrix3x3t<TReal>& aiMatrix3x3t<TReal>::FromToMatrix(const aiVector3t<TReal>& from,
00271     const aiVector3t<TReal>& to, aiMatrix3x3t<TReal>& mtx)
00272 {
00273     const TReal e = from * to;
00274     const TReal f = (e < 0)? -e:e;
00275 
00276     if (f > static_cast<TReal>(1.0) - static_cast<TReal>(0.00001))     /* "from" and "to"-vector almost parallel */
00277     {
00278         aiVector3D u,v;     /* temporary storage vectors */
00279         aiVector3D x;       /* vector most nearly orthogonal to "from" */
00280 
00281         x.x = (from.x > 0.0)? from.x : -from.x;
00282         x.y = (from.y > 0.0)? from.y : -from.y;
00283         x.z = (from.z > 0.0)? from.z : -from.z;
00284 
00285         if (x.x < x.y)
00286         {
00287             if (x.x < x.z)
00288             {
00289                 x.x = static_cast<TReal>(1.0);
00290                 x.y = x.z = static_cast<TReal>(0.0);
00291             }
00292             else
00293             {
00294                 x.z = static_cast<TReal>(1.0);
00295                 x.x = x.y = static_cast<TReal>(0.0);
00296             }
00297         }
00298         else
00299         {
00300             if (x.y < x.z)
00301             {
00302                 x.y = static_cast<TReal>(1.0);
00303                 x.x = x.z = static_cast<TReal>(0.0);
00304             }
00305             else
00306             {
00307                 x.z = static_cast<TReal>(1.0);
00308                 x.x = x.y = static_cast<TReal>(0.0);
00309             }
00310         }
00311 
00312         u.x = x.x - from.x; u.y = x.y - from.y; u.z = x.z - from.z;
00313         v.x = x.x - to.x;   v.y = x.y - to.y;   v.z = x.z - to.z;
00314 
00315         const TReal c1 = static_cast<TReal>(2.0) / (u * u);
00316         const TReal c2 = static_cast<TReal>(2.0) / (v * v);
00317         const TReal c3 = c1 * c2  * (u * v);
00318 
00319         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
00320         {
00321             for (unsigned int j = 0; j < 3; j++)
00322             {
00323                 mtx[i][j] =  - c1 * u[i] * u[j] - c2 * v[i] * v[j]
00324                     + c3 * v[i] * u[j];
00325             }
00326             mtx[i][i] += static_cast<TReal>(1.0);
00327         }
00328     }
00329     else  /* the most common case, unless "from"="to", or "from"=-"to" */
00330     {
00331         const aiVector3D v = from ^ to;
00332         /* ... use this hand optimized version (9 mults less) */
00333         const TReal h = static_cast<TReal>(1.0)/(static_cast<TReal>(1.0) + e);      /* optimization by Gottfried Chen */
00334         const TReal hvx = h * v.x;
00335         const TReal hvz = h * v.z;
00336         const TReal hvxy = hvx * v.y;
00337         const TReal hvxz = hvx * v.z;
00338         const TReal hvyz = hvz * v.y;
00339         mtx[0][0] = e + hvx * v.x;
00340         mtx[0][1] = hvxy - v.z;
00341         mtx[0][2] = hvxz + v.y;
00342 
00343         mtx[1][0] = hvxy + v.z;
00344         mtx[1][1] = e + h * v.y * v.y;
00345         mtx[1][2] = hvyz - v.x;
00346 
00347         mtx[2][0] = hvxz - v.y;
00348         mtx[2][1] = hvyz + v.x;
00349         mtx[2][2] = e + hvz * v.z;
00350     }
00351     return mtx;
00352 }
